titleInfo.title: Proceedings of [the Cherokee] Council [including a talk from Jos[eph] McMinn, Governor of Tennessee], 1818 May, Cherokee Agency / [signed by] Jos[eph] McMinn

mods.abstract: Cherokee Council minutes which include a talk from Joseph McMinn, Governor of Tennessee dated May 1818. McMinn presents the Treaty of the Cherokee Agency, July 8, 1817, before the Cherokee and Arkansas, and he discusses the federal government's plan for the removal of Indian Nations east of the Mississippi and the "civilization" of these people. The council minutes following McMinn's address appear to be in a different hand, but seem connected contextually.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This MODS record was generated into MODS v3.5 from the TEI teiHeader by University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/utkdigitalinitiatives/tei-to-mods.
